entry.title: Where You Found Me Waiting
entry.summary:
Author: Malory2

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,606Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: In the charred quiet of the Hale house ruins, Stiles finds Derek exactly where grief has always pulled him back — not broken, but worn thin by memory. Among ash, moonlight, and the slow breath of a place that remembers fire, they sit together in wordless devotion, letting presence do what time cannot. The world does not heal here; it softens, just enough to hold them.

entry.title: The Fox and the Wolves
entry.summary:
Author: Nathysama

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 55,705Chapters: 19/?Kudos: 72

Summary: In the coveted lands of Beacon Hills, a prized territory within Caeloria, magic is power—and its absence invites scorn. Stiles Stilinski, heir to an ancient house, bears the burden of being an inert: born without Arkanis, the magic that rules the realm. Ignored by his family and underestimated by enemies, he’s determined to protect the Stilinski legacy—even without the power others deem essential.With his grandfather leading amidst tense gatherings and his father missing under mysterious circumstances, Stiles is isolated and vulnerable. But the reclusive Hale family—feared for their near-feral strength—emerges as a potential ally. Together, wolves and foxes must face threats in the forests and the halls of nobility.Conspiracies and ancient magic place Beacon Hills at the center of a storm. Stiles must prove that even without Arkanis, a fox’s cunning can outmatch a kingdom of wolves.

entry.summary:

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,408Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 18

Summary: Are your intrusive thoughts supposed to, well, be that intrusive? Probably not, but surely there's no harm in it, right? entry.title: The Voyeur
entry.summary:
Author: Book_Sniffer

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,938Chapters: 2/40Kudos: 0

Summary: Stiles never meant to use his binoculars for anything but the force of good, but that’s probably how a lot of villains start out. The road to Hell and all that. But honestly, if the Universe didn’t want him to spy on his neighbours, it would have told Hottie McScowlface across the yard to buy a set of curtains when he first moved in.Or to work out with clothes on.Or to take his weekly conquests to another apartment for sexy times - one with curtains or without any windows at all. Thank God, it didn't.

entry.title: The Best Reception
entry.summary:
Author: Nightowl_22

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,204Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 17

Summary: It had been eighteen days since Stiles left with the FBI to handle a case upstate. Eighteen days of silence broken only by brief, static-filled phone calls. Derek remembered how their one-year-old daughter, Elle, had fussed when Stiles packed his go-bag. Stiles had lifted her, kissed her chubby cheeks, and promised he’d be back soon to spend days doing nothing with her and her “grumpy, beautiful Papa.” When the text finally came—“Crossing into Beacon Hills. Home in 20.”—Derek had closed the library early, put Elle to bed, and stripped bare in their bedroom. He’d waited, skin buzzing with anticipation, until he heard the familiar rumble of the Jeep pulling into the driveway.

entry.title: All Around Me I Heard You Pass
entry.summary:
Author: sockpuppetstrings

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,465Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 17

Summary: Beacon Hills is an isolated town encompassed by deep forests. Trade and newcomers are common enough, but they are small and few. And perhaps it is because of this and the gods that govern their land that they experience a great deal of peace and prosperity.Beyond the Boundary lies the Great Forest, where their gods reside. The Hale Pantheon consists of nine main wolf deities: Peter, Kali, Laura, Cora, Jordan, Danny, Erica, Malia, and Derek. Derek, the dark mark on the Hale house, is the small-time deity Stiles’ mother has chosen as her patron.On the dreadful day of his mother’s death, the Nemeton is severed—a burgeoning god meant to join the Hale Pantheon. Someone local is to blame and Peter retaliates by descending on the village with a terrible decree: the town must sacrifice one of its own for the next eight years.It's a mysterious affair. Someone is simply chosen in spring and disappears at Year’s End, never to be heard from again.On the eighth year of this rite, Stiles and Lydia turn eighteen, which automatically makes them candidates for the sacrificial pool. The name that survives Peter’s holy fire changes the course of both their lives.

entry.title: The Truth Always Escapes
entry.summary:
Author: stereksterek

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 32,398Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 101

Summary: Derek sighed tiredly before taking a seat at the opposite end of the sofa and opening the book. “It looks at how pack members experience the bond based on what they are. Instincts and connections vary greatly from born werewolves, to bitten werewolves, banshees, hunters, and even humans.” Stiles paused, “That… actually sounds very interesting. I kinda wanna read it now. But my head feels like a warzone, and I definitely don’t have the energy to hold a book that heavy in my hands right now.” He twisted and hoisted his legs up onto the couch when he had an idea. “Maybe you could read it to me, Sourwolf? And who knows? Maybe hearing you say more than two sentences in a row might be enough to actually shock the sickness out of me?” ------------------------------------------------------------------Or the one where Stiles wakes up sick thinking his day can’t get any worse, but boy was he wrong…

entry.title: of all the gin joints
entry.summary:
Author: wishingonalightningbolt

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,266Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 204

Summary: “Dude!” Scott says. “Did you know Derek Hale is over there?!” Stiles laughs, nodding. “Yeah, Scotty, I noticed.” “You have to go say something! We have to go say something!” “Say what?” Stiles asks. “I see your 2014 hat trick against the Oilers in my dreams?” “That would be a good place to start,” Scott says. “You should tell him about the rookie card!” “So I can seem like a pathetic kid?” Stiles scoffs. “Yeah, great idea.” “I think it’s cute,” Kira tells him. “Very sweet.” “Sweet,” Lydia agrees, “but not sexy.” “Sexy?” Scott says, screwing up his face. “Why would we want to be sexy in front of Derek Hale?” -0- In which Derek is Stiles' hockey hero, and they end up in the same bar together one spring evening in 2017.

entry.title: the shape of being chosen
entry.summary:
Author: sourwolf97

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,246Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 96

Summary: Derek huffs, the softest hesitation of a laugh, warm against his skin. “You talk in your sleep,” he counters quietly. “A lot.” Panic flickers up his spine before Stiles can stop it. He forces his voice to stay light, easy. “It’s probably just my soul trying to escape my body,” he says. “Can’t blame it, really.” But inside, he’s scrolling through mental footage of every night he’s ever crashed here, cataloguing every murky, half-remembered dream, wondering what words might have slipped out when his guard was down. Did he say Derek’s name? Did he say I love you? Did he say don’t leave? Did he confess the whole pathetic thesis statement his brain has been footnoting for months now: I know this isn’t actually anything for you, and that’s fine, I’m fine, please just let me keep pretending until you get bored?

entry.title: Carry That Weight
entry.summary:
Author: sara_luckyj

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,941Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 116

Summary: Once the girl had left his room, after he had put every possible contact number, email, and address he could think of into her phone, he proceeded to get absolutely shit-faced all by himself on a bottle of berry Absolut someone had left in his mini fridge, drunk dialed Jackson, Greenberg, and Coach Finstock purely to hang up on them and laugh into his pillow for no reason, and then he booked an earlier flight home for Thanksgiving. Stiles was going to need all the time possible to hash things out with his dad, and to cry himself out on Scotty's shoulder. He was going to be a dad."Holy Mary Mother of God," he said, channelling the Goonies. "Someone needs to stop me." Stiles gets a girl pregnant, keeps the baby, learns what a nasal aspirator is, and gets the guy. All in a year's work.
